name: In the Heart of Athens Walk to Everything! SotElen
description: Stay in our luxurious, newly renovated apartment at Menandrou 9, right in the heart of Athens! Just a 13 minutes walk to the Acropolis and 10 minutes to Monastiraki, you'll be surrounded by the cityâs top attractions. Psiri Square, with its lively cafes and nightlife, is 5 minutes away, while Omonia Metro is a short walk for easy transit. Enjoy modern amenities like a rain shower, air conditioning, and high-speed Wi-Fi in a stylish, comfortable space. Book now for the perfect Athenian getaway!
neighborhood_overview:
Located in the vibrant heart of Athens, Menandrou 9 is your gateway to the cityâs most exciting neighborhoods. Just steps from Platia Theatrou, a cultural hub buzzing with theaters, galleries, and trendy cafes, youâll be surrounded by creativity and history. This square has recently become a hotspot for art and local festivals, making it the perfect place to soak up Athensâ dynamic urban life.

Within a short stroll, youâll find Psiri, a lively neighborhood famous for its street art, hidden tavernas, and vibrant nightlife. Here, the pulse of modern Athens beats strong, with a mix of traditional and contemporary charm. Whether youâre looking for a cozy spot for dinner or a trendy bar, Psiri has it all, making it a must-visit for foodies and night owls alike.

For history enthusiasts, Monastiraki Square is just a 10-minute walk away, where ancient ruins sit alongside a bustling flea market. From here, you can explore the Acropolis or lose yourself in the winding stree

You are planning a stay of 2 weeks or several months in Athens and want to enjoy the proximity to all the sights, restaurants and bars in the trendy Koukaki neighbourhood. Then the Athens Yoga Apartment is just right for you. On 75 square metres you will find enough space for a longer stay and the perfect yoga room with wooden parquet flooring.

name: Theo Homeybee Exarcheia Apt No20-4
description:
Hello Homey!

Cute and cosy 4th-floor private room in 5 rooms apartment in Exarchia, one of the most prominent urban neighbourhoods in the heart of Athens. Being close to public transport stations (metro, bus, railway), yet in walking-distance from a variety of historic landmarks and must-see places in the city, it offers an ideal accommodation for individual travelers and loving couples!
host_about:
Hello, I'm Theo.
  I live in the neighborhood of Exarcheia and I deal exclusively with the short-term rental of my privately owned apartments, so I have the opportunity to have discreet but direct contact with my guests and I will be very happy to help your smooth stay in Athens.
  I live very close to all my apartments and, as I am fully committed to the convenience and care of my guests' accommodation, I am always happy to meet new people and share local tips and "inside information" of the city.

  During the summer, I am also happy to have my guests at home for coffee or a drink - my house has a wonderful terrace with stunning views of Lycabettus, the Parthenon and the cityscape of Athens.  You'll love it!  In any other case, you will probably meet  coffee of the Exarcheion say hello and have a raki with me!

  We hope to see you soon!

name: Vaios Art Residence
description: Welcome to Vaios Art Residence, a spacious and elegantly designed apartment located in the heart of Athens, just steps away from the vibrant Pedion Areos Park. Offering a perfect blend of comfort and modern amenities, this 90-square-meter residence is an ideal choice for families, couples, or groups of friends looking for a luxurious stay in one of Athensâ most sought-after neighborhoods.
neighborhood_overview:
Pedion Areos is a lively and culturally rich neighborhood located in the heart of Athens, offering a perfect balance of city life and natural beauty. Named after the expansive Pedion Areos Park, one of the largest green spaces in Athens, the area is ideal for visitors seeking a vibrant, local atmosphere combined with the tranquility of lush surroundings. The park itself is a popular spot for leisurely strolls, jogging, and relaxing under the shade of its tall trees, with well-maintained paths, gardens, and fountains providing a peaceful retreat from the bustle of the city.

The neighborhood surrounding Pedion Areos is known for its eclectic mix of cafes, restaurants, and shops, where you can experience the authentic flavors of Greek cuisine and the charm of Athens' local culture. From traditional tavernas serving classic dishes to trendy cafes where locals gather, Pedion Areos offers a diverse dining scene that caters to all tastes. The area is also home to several bakeries,

name: Studio apartment in trendy Koukaki, Athens
description:
1 bedroom 5th floor apartment, in a peaceful street, located at the foothills of Filopappou Hill. Were also a 7-10 minute walk away from the nearest metro (Syngrou-Fix).

Koukaki was voted one of the most hippest/interesting areas to stay in the world! Its stylish shops, the proximity to the Acropolis Museum Acropolis metro station (which is also walkable in about 15-20 minutes) and the local archeological sites, as well as the laid-back vibe make it one of the best non-touristy neighborhoods.

description: Cental and spacious apartment with high speed internet, newly renovated, 6 min walking distance from metro station Metaxourgeio.
neighborhood_overview:
The apartment is located in the neighborhood of Metaxourgeio-Central Athens.
6 min walking distance from metro station Metaxourgeio.
Just 1 stop from Omonia metro station.

The location of the apartment is very central.

Distance from:

- Vathis square: 300 m
- Metaxourgeio metro station: 600 m
-Omonia metro station: 700 m
-Syntagma square: 1.8 km
- Lycabettus Hill: 1.8 km
- National Arqueological Museum: 700 m
-Athens University of Economics: 1.2 km

The apartment is convenient for supermarket, bars, restaurants and coffee shops.

Dear future guests!

Wish you a pleasant stay!
